title: Aubrey Plaza
summary: Aubrey Christina Plaza[1] (born June 26, 1984)[2] is an American actress, comedian, producer, and writer. She began her career performing improv and sketch comedy at the Upright Citizens Brigade Theater. She starred as April Ludgate on the NBC sitcom Parks and Recreation (2009–2015), and later featured in the FX drama series Legion (2017–2019).
